description.brief: REEM arm navigation configuration and launch files.

stack.description: The contents of this stack are based on the original pr2_arm_navigation, and has been following its evolution since the Boxturtle release, hence credit for its contents goes mainly to the authors of the original stack. The authors listed in this stack's packages have mostly adapting the original work to the REEM robot.
stack.author: Maintained by Adolfo Rodriguez Tsouroukdissian
